text: Life and Nothing But () is a 1989 French war drama movie directed by Bertrand Tavernier and starring Philippe Noiret, Sabine Azéma, Pascale Vignal, François Perrot, Jean-Pol Dubois, Jean-Paul Comart, Daniel Russo, Frédéric Pierrot. ==Other websites== * Category:1989 drama movies Category:1989 war movies Category:French drama movies Category:World War I movies Category:Movies directed by Bertrand Tavernier
title: Life and Nothing But
